title: How to delete state holidays from the USHolidays calendar for Thunderbird
content: I use the USHolidays calendar within Thunderbird. As of today, this calendar now includes all state holidays. Is it possible to delete or filter out all state holidays so that only the US (federal) holidays appear? Note that I am using Thunderbird version 115.15.0 (64-bit). Thank you in advance for your assistance.

title: AIUTO MAIL - Account di Alice che non trovo più.
content: Salve, premesso che non sono un esperto di tante cose però cerco di spiegare cosa mi è capitato IL 25/09/2024. Mentre operavo da mail di alicemail da casa, mi è uscito a video un messaggio tipo (vuoi associare la mail a thunderbird o qualcosa di simile), c'erano due opzioni SI o NO. Forse erroneamente ho risposto SI e non so come, dal quel giorno non riesco ad accedere più alla mia mail di alice nemmeno a leggere la posta, quando provo a entrare con le mie credenziali, rilasciando il seguente messaggio di errore "accesso al server non riuscito. Prova più tardi". Sto cercando di spiegare cosa mi è successo a parole mie, non sono un tecnico e non informatico, scusate se mi sono dilungato ma per me è un problema serio e sto cercando in qualche modo di risolvere. Grazie anticipatamente a coloro che leggono e se possono darmi dei consigli utili. Grazie

title: calendar thunderbird does not fit in window
content:
Hello, my thunderbird calendar does not fit in the display windows. I have 3 monitors - 21,24 and 27 inches. Thunderbird was on a window that is 24 inches. After moving to a window that is 21 the application did not compress the calendar and I do not see all days from Monday to Sunday only Monday-Saturday.

After moving to the largest window of 27 inches thunderbird stretched even more and then after moving to a window of 21 inches even more gaps were visible, this time I see only the days Monday - Thursday.

I need help, I want all days of the week to be visible on the 21 inch monitor and the calendar to be in its original size

Translated with DeepL.com (free version)
creator: mariusz200701

title: Thunderbird hangs - Mac
content: Latest version of TB hangs on latest version of MacOS. First couple of times restart caused inbox to show but nothing could be done - froze after any action. Stop process. Restart - now nothing - it shows running but no windows. They really messed up a great program with this Nebula ...
creator: rezganj

title: Sync issue with GMail
content:
I am experiencing a strange behavior in syncing with GMail. Some emails in TB are not displayed correctly. I see the header but not the content (Image 1). In GMail on the browser all the content is displayed (Image 2). Sometimes the emails contained in a folder (label in GMail) are not displayed in TB.

At the moment I do this to solve it: I move the email/folder to another location. Then I bring the email/folder back to the original location. This seems to force the sync and allows me to see the content of the message and all the emails inside a folder (label).

Is there a way, a setting or a fix to ensure the correct sync between GMail and TB? Thanks

NB: (Windows 10 22H2 - TB 128.3.0esr 64-bit)
creator: l.amodei

title: Cut & Paste doesn't work
content:
Hi,

I have just upgraded to Thunderbird email 128.3.0esr (64bit) nebula and in this latest upgrade cannot cut and past anything.

If I copy and past either using the mouse, drop down menu or CtrL keys you appear to be able to copy but when you paste nothing happens.

This occurs from within the email or trying to copy / paste from other emails or external text.

Any help or ideas you can offer me.

Kind regards,

Warren

title: can't get access to imap
content:
Hiya, I have two email accounts running on thunderbird. They are set up with imap. They ran perfect, but since about 4-6 weeks their connecting to imap is not or hardly happening. Last week for some reason they connected back and new messages were loaded, but after that moment, no more. I have checked the imap settings on both accounts (one with dds.nl and one with gmail.com) and they are still correct. I have downloaded the latest version of thunderbird, but no improvement. What is going wrong?

Cheers, Bertus

title: Email inbox does not refresh after I delete an email
content: I perform this action many times a day. Yesterday I got a message from Thunderbird that I needed to delete emails from my inbox file, and I deleted a number of large emails, and now I no longer get this message. But now my inbox will still not refresh, and I must refresh Thunderbird each time I delete an email. What can I do to make this an efficient process again and restore the ability to delete emails without having to refresh Thunderbird each time?
creator: glindsay
